==Regular season== During the [[1969 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament]], Purdue qualified for the [[1969 NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Tournament|Final Four]], where they lost to the [[1968-69 UCLA Bruins men's basketball team|UCLA Bruins]].
==NCAA basketball tournament== *South **Purdue 91, Miami, Ohio 71 **Purdue 75, Marquette 73 *Final Four **Purdue 92, North Carolina 65 **UCLA 92, Purdue 72 <ref>http://www.databasesports.com/ncaab/tourney.htm?yr=1969</ref>
